original_text:
This is what the Lord says:
“Where is your mother’s certificate of divorce
    with which I sent her away?
Or to which of my creditors
    did I sell you?
Because of your sins you were sold;
    because of your transgressions your mother was sent away.
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 내가 너희의 어미를 내보낸 이혼 증서가 어디 있느냐 내가 어느 채주에게 너희를 팔았느냐 보라 너희는 너희의 죄악으로 말미암아 팔렸고 너희의 어미는 너희의 배역함으로 말미암아 내보냄을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
Where is your mother's certificate of divorce
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 어미의 이혼 증서가 어디 있는가

sentences.original_text: with which I sent her away?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그녀를 내보낼 때 사용했던 그것이 어디 있는가?

sentences.original_text: Or to which of my creditors
Because of your sins you were sold;
because of your transgressions your mother was sent away.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 범죄 때문에 너희 어미가 내보냄을 받았다.
